title: Jade
description: Tired of living as a number in a drab cubicle, plain Jane Smith quits her job and invests her savings in reinventing herself. A sexy new wardrobe and hairstyle and her far-from-plain alter-ego Jade is born. Despite a dismal history on the dating scene, Jade takes the town by storm. And when her perfect man turns out to be a vampire, all is still well. Until all the other men she dated begin to disappear...
author: Angela Kee
